title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 463 - Payment To An Owner Or Tenant Of Property Acquired By The Commissioner Of Parks, Recreation And Historic Preservation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 463 - Payment To An Owner Or Tenant Of Property Acquired By The Commissioner Of Parks, Recreation And Historic Preservation

State Regulations
§ 463.0 - Repealed
§ 463.1 - Purpose
§ 463.2 - Definitions
§ 463.3 - General provisions applicable to residential and commercial moving expenses
§ 463.4 - Residential moving expenses
§ 463.5 - Commercial moving expenses
§ 463.6 - Procedure for actual cost-basis moving expenses
§ 463.7 - "in lieu of" moving expenses for business or farm occupants
§ 463.8 - Actual, reasonable and necessary searching fees
§ 463.9 - Actual direct losses of tangible personal property
§ 463.10 - Supplemental relocation payments, loss of favorable mortgage financing, incidental expenses
§ 463.11 - Appeals procedure
§ 463.12 - Hardship cases
§ 463.13 to 463.15 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 463

Statutory authority: Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Law, §
3.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
